summary: Completed comprehensive testing of progress tracking feature. Backend APIs 100% functional, progress page UI works correctly when authenticated, but frontend login form integration has issues.

ui_bugs.issue: Login form submission not working - API login succeeds but frontend form doesn't process response correctly

integration_issues.issue: Users cannot login through UI form despite backend API working correctly

passed_tests: Backend API - All 19 endpoints working including 4 new progress tracking endpoints (100% success)
GET /api/progress/stats - Get progress statistics with goal calculations
Progress page loads correctly when authenticated (/progreso)
Dashboard has 'Registrar mi peso' quick action link
Progress page displays all 4 stats cards: Peso Inicial, Peso Actual, Meta, Cambio
Chart section 'Evolución de Peso' renders correctly
Records history section displays weight entries
Add weight modal opens and form works correctly
Weight record submission updates stats and history in real-time
Chart displays weight data points with orange line
Quick action navigation from dashboard to progress page works
Navbar Progreso link navigation works correctly

success_percentage.backend: 100% - All progress tracking APIs working perfectly including statistics calculations
success_percentage.frontend: 85% - Progress page UI works perfectly when authenticated, but login form has integration issues

action_item_for_main_agent: Fix frontend login form integration - the backend login API works perfectly (returns valid token), but the frontend form submission doesn't properly handle the response or update authentication state. Users can only access progress features through manual token setup, not through the UI login flow.
